name: SIC Group
headAddress: USA, Washington DC, 1707 L St NW
goal:
Strategic Information & Communication Group is a management consulting firm
with a three-directional focus in the areas of Public Relations, Marketing Strategy and
Government Relations

Using the experience of collaboration
with leading organizations across the
private, public and social sectors, we do
our best helping clients achieve efficient
results
By creating the basis for cooperative
and transparent relations between
businesses and government agencies,
SIC Group is raising the professional and
ethical standards for communication to
the highest levels of best global practices

Learn more about SIC Group Consulting: www.sic-group.eu/company.pdf
